channel.title: Math on Claudio Toro-Serey
channel.description: Recent content in Math on Claudio Toro-Serey

item.title: Vector Operations and Linear Models
item.description: Introduction Vector and matrix mutiplication Introduction As a psychology student I (unfortunately) wasn’t told to take any math courses during my undergrad, and by the time I was starting my Ph.D. I had forgotten most of the math I learned in high school. Well, unlike what I was told in undergrad, psychological research has become quite mathy, and its interaction with cognitive and computational neuroscience means that you are very likely to run into the linear algebra and calculus that your teenager self swore would never become useful.
